# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_CAN_DEFORM_WHEELS

## Summary
Allow/disable the wheel deformation

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle: Index - Index of the vehicle.
* **BOOL** canDeformWheels: Enable/disable wheel deformation
